channel.title: How do i make a java file?
channel.description:
okay im trying to add a clan chat to my 508 and the tut im following says make a ClanChat.java so i add a new text doc and name it ClanChat but then and do the same for Room.java and add the stuff in there and i compile and get 7 errors and the first one says this
[code].\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:14: package palidino76.rs2.clanchat does not exist import palidino76.rs2.clanchat.ClanChat; ^[/code]
so how do i fix this?

item.title: How do i make a java file?
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay its either my coding or the tut i followed. is there any clanchat tut links?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a java file?
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay i copied the java files of clanchat and room from a dif source and i get this error?

Compiling palidino76.rs2 .\palidino76\rs2\Engine.java:14: cannot access palidino76.rs2.clanchat.ClanChat bad class file: .\palidino76\rs2\clanchat\ClanChat.java file does not contain class palidino76.rs2.clanchat.ClanChat Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa th. import palidino76.rs2.clanchat.ClanChat; ^

what now?

Scape-JAVA:

save it as all files, and at the end of your file put .java for example test.java and there your done.

what do you mean?? confused here? do you mean like save the file names as ClanChat.java? like that?

Read full topic
